localResource.name: VM_type
localResource.label: VM_type
localResource.queryString: SELECT enum_translator_view_2_3.value, enum_translator_view_2_3.enum_key, sort = 0 FROM enum_translator_view_2_3, vm_configuration_view_2_3 WHERE vm_configuration_view_2_3.vm_type = enum_translator_view_2_3.enum_key AND enum_translator_view_2_3.enum_type = 'VM_TYPE' AND vm_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id in (SELECT cluster_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id FROM cluster_configuration_view_2_3 WHERE cluster_configuration_view_2_3.datacenter_id = $P{P_DataCenter_ID}) AND vm_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' THEN vm_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id ELSE $P{P_Cluster_ID} END UNION SELECT 'All', -1, 1 FROM enum_translator_view_2_3 ORDER BY sort DESC
